ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectSpuzzum Indian Band - British Columbia. ** Setting Apart of Lands **
PrecisSetting apart of 9.415 hectares (23.264 acres) of land, mines and minerals included to the extent that Canada has any interest in mines and minerals, for the use and benefit of the Spuzzum Indian Band, as an addition to Spuzzum Indian Reserve NÂ° 1, in British Columbia.
